reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews: Great professor with clear explanations.
Assignments are challenging but fair.
Very approachable and always willing to help.
The lectures can be a bit fast-paced, but overall, a good learning experience.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews: Best math professor I've ever had!
Makes complex concepts easy to understand.
Always available during office hours.
Engaging lectures that keep you interested.
Highly recommend for anyone interested in math.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews: Lectures are informative but sometimes hard to follow.
The grading is strict, but she is fair.
Labs are interesting, but the workload is heavy.
Good professor, but you need to put in a lot of effort.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews: Not very engaging in lectures.
The exams are difficult and cover a lot of material.
Office hours are limited and often crowded.
Would recommend finding another professor if possible.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews: Passionate about the subject and it shows.
Encourages deep thinking and discussion.
Provides detailed feedback on essays.
Always supportive and understanding.
Fantastic professor who makes literature come alive.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews: Very knowledgeable and passionate about biology.
Her exams are tough but fair.
Provides great resources for studying.
Sometimes her lectures can be a bit dense.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews: Lectures can be dry at times.
He expects a lot from his students.
Homework assignments are useful but time-consuming.
Good at explaining complex theories but can be unapproachable.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews: Excellent professor who makes the subject interesting.
Her classes are interactive and engaging.
Always available to help with course material.
Grading is fair and she provides constructive feedback.

reviews.subject: History
reviews: Lectures are boring and hard to follow.
He reads directly from the textbook.
Not very approachable outside of class.
The exams are very detailed and difficult.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews: Very engaging and thought-provoking lectures.
She encourages class participation.
Assignments are relevant to real-world issues.
Her grading can be tough but fair.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews: Good professor but sometimes disorganized.
He’s very knowledgeable but can go off-topic.
Exams are challenging but fair.
Office hours are helpful but limited.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews: Passionate about the environment and it shows.
Her lectures are inspiring and informative.
She encourages hands-on learning and fieldwork.
One of the best professors I’ve had.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews: Lectures are interesting but can be confusing.
He challenges you to think critically.
His exams are tough but fair.
Not very approachable for extra help.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews: Very passionate about art and history.
Her lectures are detailed and engaging.
Assignments are interesting and relevant.
Sometimes the workload can be heavy.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews: Lectures are difficult to follow.
The exams are very challenging.
He’s not very responsive to emails.
Would recommend another professor if possible.

reviews.subject: English
reviews: Amazing professor who cares about her students.
Her feedback on essays is very detailed.
She makes literature interesting and accessible.
Highly recommend her classes!

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews: Lectures are informative but can be dry.
He’s very knowledgeable but not the best at explaining concepts.
Exams are tough but fair.
Office hours are helpful but sometimes crowded.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews: She’s very clear in her explanations.
Lab sessions are well-organized and informative.
Exams are challenging but she prepares you well.
Great professor, would recommend.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews: Amazing professor with a deep knowledge of the subject.
Assignments are challenging but rewarding.
He’s always willing to help outside of class.
Great at making complex concepts understandable.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews: Lectures are detailed but can be confusing.
She expects a lot from her students.
The exams are tough and require a lot of study.
She’s helpful during office hours but not very approachable in class.
